findings.title: Unaudited Interfaces
findings.description: Contract contains interfaces that are not audited, some functions may work differently.

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: Various owner privileges: changing fees, game and rewardPool addresses, whitelisting addresses, changing router and pair addresses, changing control address.
findings.location: Owner privileged functions (setBuy, setSell, setAddress, setWhite, setPair, setControl)
